content.p: Prophase is a preparatory phase where some items need to be dismantled and others built. Select if each of the following is dismantled or built during prophase.

response.feedback: Correct. The nucleoli are not needed for cell division and are dismantled.
Incorrect. The nucleoli are not needed for cell division and are dismantled.
Correct. Dismantling the nuclear envelope allows components of the mitotic spindle to attach to the DNA inside the nucleus.
Incorrect. Dismantling the nuclear envelope allows components of the mitotic spindle to attach to the DNA inside the nucleus.
Incorrect. The mitotic spindle is made of microtubules that attach to the chromosomes and move them to opposite poles of the cell.
Correct. The mitotic spindle is made of microtubules that attach to the chromosomes and move them to opposite poles of the cell.
